Member Function Documentation

- (void) applyForce: (cpVect)  force  

Apply a constant force to our shape's body

Reimplemented from <cpCCNodeDelegate>.

- (void) applyImpulse: (cpVect)  impulse  

Apply an impulse (think gun shot) to our shape's body

Property Documentation

- (BOOL) autoFreeShape [read, write, assign]

If this is set to true & spaceManager is set, then the shape is deleted when dealloc is called

- (ccColor3B) color [read, write, assign]

Color of our drawn shape

- (BOOL) drawDecoration [read, write, assign]

Currently only circle has a "decoration" it is an extra line to see the rotation

- (BOOL) fillShape [read, write, assign]

If this is set to YES/TRUE then the shape will be filled when drawn

- (BOOL) ignoreRotation [read, write, assign]

Use if you do not want the sprite to rotate with the shape

- (cpFloat) integrationDt [read, write, assign]

If this is anything other than zero, a position change will update the shapes velocity using integrationDt to calculate it

- (cpFloat) lineWidth [read, write, assign]

Width of the drawn lines, default is 1

- (GLubyte) opacity [read, write, assign]

Opacity of our drawn shape

- (cpFloat) pointSize [read, write, assign]

Size of drawn points, default is 3

- (cpShape*) shape [read, write, assign]

The shape we're connected to

- (BOOL) smoothDraw [read, write, assign]

If this is set to YES/TRUE then the shape will be drawn with smooth lines/points

- (SpaceManager*) spaceManager [read, write, assign]

The space manager, set this if you want autoFreeShape to work
